get.summary: Search Generic Entity entities by filter
get.description: Search Generic Entity entities by filter Returns list of Generic Entity, the response can be filtered, sorted and supports pagination **For more information and examples on creating search requests, click here.** ## Filter Each additionalProp can filter one field, inside additionalProp there are many optional conditions that can be used for filtering that field By using the logical additionalProps $AND, $OR, $NOT, you can add complex nested logic filters. When sending these props, you must send only the nested filter field inside the filter value. This will allow you to group additional filters using logical AND/OR/NOT operators. When not sending a logic prop (including when not sending a nested logic prop), the props are bundled together using logical AND operators, this means that only the items that match all filter conditions for that field will be returned. ***filter*** items possible values: [ *_id*,*_ownerOrganization.id*,*_name*,*_templateId*,*_templateName*,*_lastModifiedTime*,*_creationTime* ] and all custom attributes of all templates ## Sort Results can be sorted by multiple fields, the order of the fields in the sort request governs the hierarchy of the sort The first field is the primary sort, the second is used when two values of the first field are the same, and so forth ***sort.order*** default value is DESC ***sort.prop*** possible values:[ *_id*,*_ownerOrganization.id*,*_name*,*_lastModifiedTime*,*_creationTime* ] If sort was not specified, the result will be sorted by: *_creationTime* DESC ## Free text search When freeTextSearch is passed, the free text search will be performed on every field except those of type Date If used together with filters, freeTextSearch will be bundled to the filters with the logical AND operator, this means that only items that match all filters (and each filter's conditions) and the free text search will be returned ## Page ***limit*** max number of results that will be returned for each page. If not specify, the default will be 100 ***page*** page number starting from 0. If not specify, the default will be 0 ## Build URL Encode the JSON object and use the encoded string as the searchRequest parameter: https://<URL>?searchRequest= Query Parameters: | Parameter |Type | Mandatory| Description | Example | |-------------|-------|----------|----------------------|-----------| |searchRequest||false|Search request parameters: filter, sort and page|| This API requires **PROTECTED_API** permission(s).

parameters.name: searchRequest
parameters.description: Search request parameters: filter, sort and page

200.description:
The below table describes the response parameters:

| Parameter   |Type   |Description          | Example   |
|-------------|-------|---------------------|-----------|
|data|array|List of items that match the search request||
|data[index]|array|List of items that match the search request||
|data[index]._name|string|||
|data[index]._id|string|||
|data[index]._ownerOrganization|object|||
|data[index]._ownerOrganization.id|string|A UUID formatted string|3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6|
|data[index]._ownerOrganization.templateId|string|The id of a template that is configured in the settings service.|3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6|
|data[index]._ownerOrganization.parentEntityId|string|The id of the parent entity (appears only for child entities)||
|data[index]._ownerOrganization.templateName|string|The name of the referenced entity template||
|data[index]._ownerOrganization.name|string|The caption of the referenced entity||
|data[index]._template|object|||
|data[index]._template.name|string|The name of the template||
|data[index]._template.displayName|string|The display name of the template||
|data[index]._template.parentTemplate|object|||
|data[index]._template.parentTemplate.id|string|||
|data[index]._template.parentTemplate.displayName|string|||
|data[index]._template.parentTemplate.name|string|||
|data[index]._template.id|string|The id of the template||
|data[index]._referencers|object|An object that contains all the referencers of this entity. Each referencer is the RSAN and it's an object that contains the count of the referrers, and information of the referrer (in case count = 1)||
|data[index]._creationTime|string|A UTC date-time in the ISO-8601 format|2007-12-20T10:15:30Z|
|data[index]._lastModifiedTime|string|A UTC date-time in the ISO-8601 format|2007-12-20T10:15:30Z|
|data[index]._caption|string|||
|metadata|object|||
|metadata.sort|array|Sort that was passed in the request||
|metadata.sort[index]|array|Sort that was passed in the request||
|metadata.sort[index].prop|string|The property name for the sort||
|metadata.sort[index].order|string|The direction of sort. Default DESC Values:ASC,DESC|ASC|
|metadata.filter|object|The filter that was passed in the request||
|metadata.page|object|||
|metadata.page.totalResults|integer|The total number of items that match the query|145|
|metadata.page.page|integer|Page number|3|
|metadata.page.limit|integer|Number of items per page|100|
|metadata.freeTextSearch|string|Free text search strings that was passed in the request|cat dog|

post.description: Create a new Generic Entity The name should be unique among all entities names in the same organization. (*)This parameter is mandatory only if its optional parent attribute is defined. Click here for more information. Request Body Parameters: | Parameter |Type | Mandatory| Description | Example | |-------------|-------|----------|----------------------|-----------| |_name|string|true||| |_templateId|string|true|The id of a template that is configured in the settings service.|3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6| |_ownerOrganization|object|true||| |_ownerOrganization.id|string|true(*)|A UUID formatted string|3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6| This API requires **PROTECTED_API** permission(s).

get.description:
Service Health check API

The API returns 200 if the service is up, used by the Load Balancer

This API is **public**.

_templateId.description: The id of a template that is configured in the settings service.

BasicEntityData.description: If count is 1 - holds the information about the single referencer

templateId.description: The id of a template that is configured in the settings service.

parentEntityId.description: The id of the parent entity (appears only for child entities)

templateName.description: The name of the referenced entity template

name.description: The caption of the referenced entity

displayName.description: The display name of the template

_referencers.description: An object that contains all the referencers of this entity. Each referencer is the RSAN and it's an object that contains the count of the referrers, and information of the referrer (in case count = 1)

_creationTime.description: A UTC date-time in the ISO-8601 format

_lastModifiedTime.description: A UTC date-time in the ISO-8601 format

ParentTemplateResponse.description: Base information about the template parent

name.description: The reference side attribute name from the attribute reference configuration

displayName.description: The reference side attribute display name from the attribute reference configuration

count.description: Total count of all the referencers from this specific template and attribute

ReferencedSideAttributeInformation.description: An object that contains all the referencers of this entity. Each referencer is the RSAN and it's an object that contains the count of the referrers, and information of the referrer (in case count = 1)

in.description: List of values for the IN operator

items.description: List of values for the IN operator

eq.description: Value for the EQUAL (=) operator, string, numeric, boolean or object

lt.description: Value for the LESS THAN (<) operator, numeric value only

lte.description: Value for the LESS THAN OR EQUAL operator (<=), numeric value only

gt.description: Value for the GREATER THAN operator (>), numeric value only

gte.description: Value for the GREATER THAN OR EQUAL operator (>=), numeric value only

like.description: Value for the CONTAINS operator (substring), string value only

from.description: Value for the DATE RANGE FROM operator, date value only,A UTC date in the ISO-8601 format

to.description: Value for the DATE RANGE TO operator, date value only,A UTC date in the ISO-8601 format

isNull.description: If set to true, checks if the field's value is null

isNotNull.description: If set to true, checks if the field's value is not null

not.description: Value for the NOT EQUAL (!=) operator, string, numeric, boolean or object

notIn.description: List of values for the NOT IN operator

items.description: List of values for the NOT IN operator

filter.description: Used for complex logic with filters. Must be supplied only when using with map keys $OR, $AND, $NOT

FilterV2.description: Each additionalProp can filter one field, inside additionalProp there are many optional conditions that can be used for filtering that field. When multiple conditions are specified, they are bundled together using logical AND operators, this means that only the items that match all filter conditions for that field will be returned

prop.description: The property name for the sort

order.description: The direction of sort. Default DESC

Order.description: Results can be sorted by multiple fields, the order of the fields in the sort request governs the hierarchy of the sort.The first field is the primary sort, the second is used when two values of the first field are the same, and so forth

filter.description: Each additionalProp can filter one field, inside additionalProp there are many optional conditions that can be used for filtering that field. When multiple conditions are specified, they are bundled together using logical AND operators, this means that only the items that match all filter conditions for that field will be returned

sort.description: Results can be sorted by multiple fields, the order of the fields in the sort request governs the hierarchy of the sort.The first field is the primary sort, the second is used when two values of the first field are the same, and so forth

freeTextSearch.description: Free text search strings - will be bundled to the filters with the logical AND operator. Possible to pass a few strings with space between them, the search will return a result if one of strings appears in the data entity (OR operator).

sort.description: Sort that was passed in the request

filter.description: The filter that was passed in the request

freeTextSearch.description: Free text search strings that was passed in the request

totalResults.description: The total number of items that match the query

data.description: List of items that match the search request
